skins.shipDescription: Gridley-class destroyer - Gridley, Hull Number DD-380!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the first ship of the Gridley-class, and I was very active in the Pacific theater. But never mind that now, Commander. Want to look at photos of Sara?
skins.acquisition: Nice to meet you, Commander! I'm Gridley. I once escorted Saratoga~ She's such a cutie!
skins.login: Hey, Commander~ So listen, Sara's just soooo cute!
skins.details: Wow, look at that cutie! No, not me! The one over there!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've got plenty of pictures of Sara. 800 bucks a print!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Mississippi will bring me back home just fine if I get lost!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, have you seen Sara? I want to try my new camera!
skins.secretaryTouch: Aaah, that tickles~! I can't keep the camera straight~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! If you do that again, I'll photograph it and report it to the police~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Merry Christmas! Guhehe~ Won't you attend my "Super Special Sexy Sara (tentative)" photoshoot event?
skins.acquisition: Commander, Merry Christmas! Guhehe~ Won't you attend my "Super Special Sexy Sara (tentative)" photoshoot event?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Christmas special edition Saratoga photos, one thousand dollars each! Guhehe~ my fangirl power level increases during the holiday season!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, can you take some photos of me with Saratoga?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Thanks for the waterproof camera, Commander! I'll be sure to take good care of it!
skins.secretaryTouch: What's in this bag? Guhehe~ an album of premium Saratoga photos! As long as I have this, she will always be at my side!
